text: The LMP – Hungary's Green Party (Hungarian: LMP – Magyarország Zöld Pártja ) is a centrist political party in Hungary. It was founded in 2009. The party focuses on environmental protection, fighting corruption, and supporting green energy. LMP wants Hungary to be more eco-friendly and fair. They support better public transportation, renewable energy, and protecting forests and rivers. The party also works for social justice and equal opportunities for all people. LMP has seats in the National Assembly and takes part in elections to represent green and progressive ideas. == References == Category:Political parties in Hungary Category:Green political parties
title: LMP – Hungary's Green Party
